home.description: Professional self-drive car rental service to meet all your personal travel needs
home.desc_first:
Rent smart, eco-friendly electric vehicles.
Experience a
home.step_1_desc: Choose a car that fits your needs and select the most convenient pickup station.
home.step_2_desc: Submit your rental request and wait for Green Wheel’s confirmation.
home.step_3_desc: Once confirmed, complete your payment via Momo or cash.
home.step_4_desc: Inspect the car, pick it up at the station, and start your trip.
home.choose_your_car_desc: Find the nearest VinFast electric car and select your preferred pickup station.
home.book_and_pay_desc: Quickly complete your payment via Momo or Cash.
home.pickup_and_go_desc: Head to the station, get your car, and start your green journey!
home.reason_electric_desc: Save energy and reduce CO₂ emissions.
home.reason_smart_desc: All bookings and invoices are fully digitized.
home.reason_safe_desc: Regularly maintained cars, always ready to go.
home.reason_green_desc: Join us in building a sustainable green planet.

policy.payment_method_text: Payment can be made online or in cash. Customers may pay a reservation fee in advance, but must pay the full amount upon receiving the vehicle.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.des: We’d love to hear from you! Fill out the form or reach us via the information below.
contact.sub: Our team will get back to you as soon as possible. For urgent matters, please call our hotline.

rental_contract.rental_contract_details_description: Detailed information about the customer's electric vehicle Rental Booking.
rental_contract.start_date_must_be_future: Pick-up time must be at least 3 hours from now and within 7 AM - 5 PM
rental_contract.end_date_must_be_after_start: The return day must be after the pick-up day at least 24 hours
rental_contract.user_already_have_contract: You can only have one pending or active booking at a time

rental_contract.can_not_cancel: This Rental Booking can not be cancelled
rental_contract.confirm_change_vehicle:
Your previously reserved vehicle is no longer available. You can choose to switch to another car of the same model or request a refund.
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.
rental_contract.unavailable_vehicle_refund:
Your reserved vehicle is no longer available, and no suitable replacement is available.
A refund will be issued. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.

rental_contract.at_least_one_party_must_sign: At least one party must sign
rental_contract.not_start_yet: This booking is not start yet

invoice.not_handover_payment: This invoice is not a handover payment

invoice.policy_subtitle: Quick guide to how invoices work
invoice.penalty_warning: Please be aware that the deposit is non-refundable if any penalty fees are incurred
invoice.visit_station_to_get_refund: Please visit our station to get the refund in cash
invoice.unit_price_min: Unit price must be greater than 0
invoice.reservation_fee_deduction:
If a reservation payment has been made, the handover invoice will deduct the reservation fee from the total amount.
However, if no reservation payment was made and the vehicle handover is paid directly, the reservation invoice will be canceled and no deduction will be applied to the handover fee.

ticket.already_escalated: This ticket already escalated to admin
ticket.already_resolved: This ticket has already been resolved
ticket.title: Title

about_us.green_wheel_description: Green Wheel — Vietnam’s leading electric car rental platform, delivering an eco-friendly, affordable, and seamless driving experience.
about_us.ev_sustainability_belief: We believe electric vehicles are the key to sustainable and environmentally friendly mobility.
about_us.customer_experience_focus: Green Wheel prioritizes customer experience above all — ensuring convenience, transparency, and safety in every ride.
about_us.innovation_description: We constantly improve our technology and expand our fleet with the latest electric vehicles to offer the best options available.
about_us.green_wheel_mission: Green Wheel was founded to accelerate the transition to clean, sustainable transportation. We provide modern electric vehicles that are environmentally friendly, helping customers enjoy smooth, cost-effective, and eco-conscious journeys.
about_us.join_us_greener_future: Ready to join us on the road to a greener future?
